title: COAS thanks mountaineer Vanessa O’Brien for promoting Pakistan as a goodwill ambassador
content:
RAWALPINDI, Nov 06 (APP): Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa Friday appreciated mountaineer Vanessa O’Brien’s achievements and thanked her for promoting Pakistan as a goodwill ambassador.
Vanessa O’Brien met with the COAS here, said Inter Services Public Relations director general in a tweet.
He said; “She is the only woman ever to climb to the world’s highest point of Mount Everest and dive to the world’s deepest point Challenger Deep, also carrying Pakistan’s flag.”
